task_history.summary: Analyzed all 10 security issues from CEO audit, confirmed each with code references, identified root causes, created comprehensive fix plan with dependencies and priority order
Unified webhook signature to timing-safe implementation (crypto.ts). Fixed CWE-208 timing attack vulnerability. 30/30 tests passing.

Implemented short-lived SSE tokens (15min) scoped to payment sessions. Added POST /v1/auth/sse-token endpoint. Updated SSE validation logic. Frontend now requests SSE tokens. 8/8 tests passing. Fixes CWE-598 token exposure risk.
